BR_text.BRsummary: Entity types with dashes cause errors in ner.pyx
BR_text.BRdescription:
When training NER task on entities that are in BILOU that also have a dash the line <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/blob/ab35ac4e6fc8c8e0d606e8eae95afbc182f8d90a/spacy/syntax/ner.pyx#L87>here</denchmark-link>
  throws this error. Simple workaround was to replace the dash character in my entities in a preprocessing step.
 <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>Info about spaCy</denchmark-h>
 
 
 spaCy version: 2.0.5
 Platform: Linux-4.4.0-1049-aws-x86_64-with-debian-stretch-sid
 Python version: 3.6.4
 Models: en_core_web_lg, en

comments_0.comment_text: You mean entity labels with dash, right? Like if the label is JOB-NAME? Agree that we shouldn't have that restriction.

comments_1.comment_text:
Yeah just like that.
